评论详情: Size Medium. Nice fit, Comfortable. I'm 5'6", 135#.

I was looking for an oversized shirt to style as a mini dress with a corset, and this one was perfect! The quality is excellent, and the white color makes it easy to pair with many other outfits. It’s a very flattering piece and a great choice overall!
Nice shirt.  The colors are bright.  I ordered the Medium and it fit well.

I don't like white tops much, but I wanted to add one or two to have variety.  The top is beautiful and has a nice fit, the fabric is great and pretty much what I expected. The button holes can get some improvement, the threads are not fully secured and when you try to unbutton the button can get stuck and pulls on them.  Not a negative of the garment, but I still need to wear something because you can see through the fabric.

评论概述: Fabric content in product description is incorrect:
评论详情: fabric content in description is incorrect:  60% polyester,37% cotton,3% spandex.  Product label says 95% polyester/5% spandex
I haven't worn it yet but think I will enjoy wearing it. I like the fabric also.
The material on this shirt was thinner than expected, but the overall look is good. Fits exactly as expected. The wrists are a little loose. Color is good and it washes well.

评论概述: I wish I sized down, but still like the loose fit
评论详情: It has a comfortable and light material, and the sizing is slightly on the looser size, which is fine since I don't like layering with balzers and whatnot.
I bought this for my elderly mom. It's beautiful on. Very comfortable. Try to size.
Me agradó todo. Voy a la oficina con esta blusa
Fits very well and has such a nice feel to it.

This top arrived just as I was looking for something to wear to go out, so I put it on and went. It fits quite well, and was just that little bit of extra niceness I wanted for a casual situation. The top is quite attractive, and will brighten up your wardrobe, maybe with a white cardigan. Nice shirt, well made, and a good value.

I love versatile button-ups just like this. I can dress it up for the office or wear it casually. The material is soft and comfortable against the skin. It is breathable making it suitable for all seasons. I loved the first one so much that I ordered a second in a different color! Highly recommend.

I love the jewel, toned royal blue color of this blouse. It fit perfectly and has a wonderful fabric combination of polyester, cotton and spandex. It comes out out of the wash unwrinkled. I would say this blouse is rather dressy and looks great with dress slacks or skirt and can be worn at the office or out to dinner. It fit true to size. Great addition to my wardrobe..
I liked this blouse it was so cute fitted perfect and felt very silky on.

评论概述: Not 3/4 Sleeve as show in photos
评论详情: This is a very nice blouse and fits well.  I’m very disappointed that the sleeves are long, but the photos of each color of the blouse show cute 3/4 length sleeves.  Description says long, photos are not of the product sold.  How are we to shop when we don’t know where the discrepancy lies?

The design on this shirt is pretty, the fabric is polyester, has a soft feel, and drapes nicely.  However, if you have a larger chest, go up one size. It fits well everywhere else, but the button struggles to stay put on my chest. (2XL, 44 chest)  Great wear to work shirt, will probably go up a size to get one that I can comfortably wear to work.

I love the intense royal blue color of this shirt. The stitching is solid and it seems to be a well-constructed garment. I'm not a big fan of long sleeves, but they can be easily rolled up without it looking bunched up, and the slight stretchiness ensures that it doesn't get too tight around the thicker part of my arms. The construction is a bit "boxy;" but it looks decent layered with a coordinating tank top and left unbuttoned, or you can use one of the shirt-tucking "hacks." As others have said, it does run a little big. If you like a more snug fit and plan on wearing it alone, you could probably go down one size, depending on how "top-heavy" you are. It washes well and doesn't wrinkle if removed from the dryer promptly. This lovely shirt will be in my regular rotation!
Nice looking well made blouse , fit my body but the sleeves were tpp short
I bought a L, and it is really gigantic. I will probably try to use it in the summer, open with a tank top. The size is not what I expected. The fabric seems good
This shirt is soft and light weight and extremely comfortable, all while maintaining a professional look!

I got this for my wife.  She says she likes it, it's nice and comfortable and a good shirt for her to wear to the office.  She likes the material, and she says the fit is about right for the size she ordered.

I ordered this shirt in a medium, the tag said S, I am assuming for small but it fits quite nicely.  It washes well and there was no dye loss, always nice with something red.  It washed and dried well with no need to iron.  Other than the size confusion, I am very pleased.I feel it important to note that on the second washing, this shirt did bleed red dye.  I did wash it in warm water rather than cold this time and that may be the cause.

This blouse runs smaller in size, so you will need to buy up 1-2 sizes.  Also, I was quite disappointed because the blouse was so thin, you could see thru both sides of it while holding it up.  I do not recommend this product… you may end up disappointed like I did.

评论概述: Very Comfortable and Cheerful, Vibrant Color
评论详情: I am a size 14 US so ordered the Size X-Large Zeagoo Womens Cotton Button Down Shirt in the Rose-Red (which is a hot pink or fushia).  The size was very generous and I could probably have been fine in just a Large.  It is very comfortable and has a nice feel and drape.  I wore this shirt on the outside of my trousers (without tucking into my slacks) and it had good coverage over my full hips and backside.  It washed well and did not pucker, shrink or lose its vibrant color.  It did require just a minimal bit of ironing to remove the fold lines that still showed slightly from when it was tightly vacuum-sealed when it arrived.  After ironing this shirt just one time, I expect this shirt to come out of the dryer looking good.  It is a nice quality garment and the price is good at under $25.  I recommend!
This button down shirt is soft and comfortable with a lil stretch. Perfect for moving around all day. Its a beautiful soft pink and a great fit
This shirt has a nice cotton feel and the fit is very flattering.  I like the neutral pattern - makes it very simple to wear!
I love the navy blue color of this shirt. It feels like any other cotton dress shirt. The fit is good based on their size chart, it fits me well. A great shirt to add to my work attire.
Great quality material and true to size. Would recommend.

评论概述: Convenient Amount of Stretchiness - Well-made - Lightweight
评论详情: This shirt is perfect for either work or casual wear.  The fabric blend isn't quite as soft as 100% cotton, but feels good against the skin (and I have sensitive skin) has a small bit of stretch, and resists wrinkles better than cotton.  The label inside agrees with the fabric blend listed on the Amazon page.  I'm 5'9", 160lbs, with a 41" bust (typically wearing a dress size of 10-12), and the medium size fit me perfectly.  It's well-made; all the seams are nicely sewn.  Note this shirt has no taper to it or princess seams, so looks like the photos on the Amazon page when tucked in, unless you intentionally gather it for a snug fit around the waist.  As advertised, the medium size has 23.6" sleeves, which for me was just a little-bit short, but ok.  Another thing to note, the shirt comes vacuum-packed and has a slight plastic-like smell until it airs-out a bit, but after that is fine.

I’ve been looking for the perfect black button down shirt for so long. This is perfect. It’s long if you want to pair with tights yet light enough to tuck inside your pants. It has a nice fitted cut, which I really like. I’m a size small and that’s what I ordered. It fits true to size. I’m 34D in bras and there’s no gaping with this shirt. I love it! 😍

The quality and color of this blouse is nice.  The description says "cotton"...nope only 37% cotton.  Farther down it says cotton, polyester and spandex.  So the majority is polyester.  My fault I did not look at how long the sleeves were in their chart and they are about 3 inches too short for me.  The short of it is if it was the largest percentage cotton with a smaller amount of polyester it would be OK but I think this will be too much for me since I am sensitive to polyester.  The top description should say polyester cotton mix, not just cotton.

I found myself wishing I had ordered this in a different color because the navy blue is so very dark. However, I like that the shirt has a little bit of stretch to it, which makes it comfortable. I can wear it to work with trousers and flats and it looks really good. I’ve also worn it under a vest and it looks cute that way as well. So it’s pretty versatile.

One of the things I like about this shirt is how well it fits around my shoulders and stomach. It has a flattering shape to it, rather than just hanging off like a sack. That being said, the bust does run a little small. The size I ordered was a few inches larger than my bust and it is just on the verge of button strain. Other than that, the shirt looks good and I plan to continue wearing it outdoors.
Seems to be well made. Material is not see-through and the seams and buttons are tight.

One of my favorite styles of shirts for the fall and winter months is the button down shirt with long sleeves. This way you can control how hot (or cold) you are by leaving the sleeves long or rolling them up as the temperature in the office is always unpredictable.  What I immediately noticed about this women's button down shirt is how the color is as stated. The blue shirt was bright and beautiful. Additionally, it was sized as fit and looked fabulous when I tried it on. The fabric is sort to the touch and the buttons are the same color as the fabric so the front looks very sharp. While I am always concerned about wrinkles, I did iron the shirt before use and the wrinkles came out easily. This shirt pairs nicely with a pair of jeans, black slacks or a colorful shirt.  The minor thing I did notice is some of the seams are not straight (down the front of the button panel) with several having two or three stitching lines as the original stitching line was broken. These were noticeable as there were left over strings along the area that I had to trim before wearing.  Overall, I liked the button down shirt and I'll be wearing it as part of my outfits. This shirt is reasonably priced and is a great basic item for any wardrobe so I'd definitely recommend it to others.
The color of this shirt is stunning and it fits nice too.  This shirt is dressy and light weight.  Perfect for Fall days.

类型: Color: Rose Red Polka DotSize: XX-Large
评论详情: I was excited for this shirt, but when I received it, I didn't really like the feel of the shirt.  Although this shirt is advertised as cotton, it only has 37% cotton.  The rest of the fabric is polyester and spandex, which are not very breathable, so I was a little disappointed by that.  The shirt does appear to be well-made.  I accidentally ordered the wrong size, so I am not sure if the shirt is true to size, but I can say the XXL is two sizes above my normal size, and it is definitely pretty big on me. Based on that, I think ordering your regular size should be fine.  I machine washed and dried the shirt without any problems, and now that it has been washed, the fabric is a little less stiff.  It's still not cotton, but it is a very nice blouse overall.  The price is a little better than other long sleeve blouses available for sale, so it seems like a good value overall.

This blouse is a blend of polyester spandex and cotton. The material looks like it won't fade in the wash or pick up lint. It's definitely not see through. It looks like the pics online. It's fitted but almost looks tailored because it's flattering and is true to size. It's not restrictive or snug in the wrong places. This blouse can be dressed up with slacks for work or down with jeans or a skirt. This blouse is a steal for the price and quality.

评论概述: A Neat and Clean Office Button Down Shirt.
评论详情: This shirt is a must have for office workers, it is a very clean look with good tailoring. The fabric is made with cotton and spandex mix so it is stretchy and easy to move and work. I really like the collar, that has some sturdiness so it made the shirt look more neat. I liked to style with a H-line skirt but can pair with any types of bottom outfit.
The deep blue color is nice!I got XL runs a bit big but nice!

Right out of the vacuum sealed bag, I was very impressed with the fabric of this shirt. It's very cool and soft and smooth. The pink isn't quite as pastel as it looked on my screen, but still a nice pink. The fit is a touch looser than I expected but lays well. I would buy again.
